alert.note: Alert for Baldwin; Mobile (Alabama) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Advisory issued August 08 at 12:32PM CDT by NWS Mobile
info.description: The National Weather Service in Mobile has issued a * Flood Advisory for... Northwestern Baldwin County in southwestern Alabama... Northern Mobile County in southwestern Alabama... * Until 330 PM CDT. * At 1232 PM CDT, Doppler radar and automated rain gauges indicated heavy rain due to thunderstorms. Minor flooding is ongoing or expected to begin shortly in the advisory area. Between 1 and 3 inches of rain has fallen and additional rainfall amounts of 1 to 2 inches are expected. * Some locations that will experience flooding include... Downtown Mobile, Midtown Mobile, Prichard, Saraland, Chickasaw, Satsuma, Creola, Chunchula, Stockton, Axis, Mount Vernon, Semmes, I65 And AL 158, I65 And I165, Movico, I65 And AL 225, Mobile Regional Airport, Pennsylvania, Hatters and Celeste.
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles. Be aware of your surroundings and do not drive on flooded roads.
